verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. In thee, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, do I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>; Let me <S%H408>never<s%> be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>: <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> me in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H5337>me<s%>; Deliver me <S%H4120>speedily<s%>: Be thou to me a <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H6697>rock<s%>, A <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4686>defence<s%> to save <S%H3467>me<s%>.
For thou art my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>; Therefore for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake <S%H5148>lead<s%> me and guide <S%H5095>me<s%>.
Pluck me <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they have laid <S%H2934>privily<s%> for <S%H4581>me<s%>; For thou art my stronghold.
Into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> I <S%H6485>commend<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: Thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, thou <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>.
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them that <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H7723>lying<s%> <S%H1892>vanities<s%>; But I <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

I will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; For thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%>: Thou hast <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H6869>adversities<s%>;
And thou hast not shut me <S%H5462>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>; Thou hast <S%H5975>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in a large <S%H4800>place<s%>.

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, for I am in <S%H6887>distress<s%>: Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H6244>wasteth<s%> away with <S%H3708>grief<s%>, <S%H5315>yea<s%>, my soul and my <S%H990>body<s%>.

For my <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H3615>spent<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>, And my <S%H8141>years<s%> with <S%H585>sighing<s%>: My <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3782>faileth<s%> because of mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, And my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are wasted <S%H6244>away<s%>.

Because of all mine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> I am become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, <S%H7934>Yea<s%>, unto my neighbors <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%>, And a <S%H6343>fear<s%> to mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%>: They that did <S%H7200>see<s%> me <S%H2351>without<s%> fled from <S%H5074>me<s%>.
I am <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> as a dead <S%H4191>man<s%> out of <S%H3820>mind<s%>: I am like a <S%H6>broken<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>defaming<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%>, <S%H4032>Terror<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>: While they took <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against <S%H2161>me<s%>, they devised to take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>.
But I <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah: I <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou art my <S%H430>God<s%>.
My <S%H6256>times<s%> are in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and from them that persecute <S%H7291>me<s%>.
Make thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: <S%H3467>Save<s%> me in thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>.

Let me not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H7563>thee<s%>: Let the wicked be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, let them be <S%H1826>silent<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.

Let the <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> be <S%H481>dumb<s%>, Which <S%H1696>speak<s%> against the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6277>insolently<s%>, With <S%H1346>pride<s%> and <S%H937>contempt<s%>.

Oh how <S%H7227>great<s%> is thy <S%H2898>goodness<s%>, Which thou hast laid <S%H6845>up<s%> for them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H6466>thee<s%>, Which thou hast wrought for them that take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H1121>thee<s%>, Before the sons of <S%H120>men<s%>!

In the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> wilt thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> them from the <S%H7407>plottings<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%>: Thou wilt keep them <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in a <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> from the <S%H7379>strife<s%> of <S%H3956>tongues<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he hath showed me his <S%H6381>marvellous<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in a <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>.

As for <S%H559>me<s%>, I said in my <S%H2648>haste<s%>, I am cut <S%H1629>off<s%> from <S%H5048>before<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: <S%H403>Nevertheless<s%> thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%> When I cried unto <S%H7768>thee<s%>.

Oh <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all ye his <S%H2623>saints<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5341>preserveth<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%>, And <S%H3499>plentifully<s%> <S%H7999>rewardeth<s%> him that <S%H6213>dealeth<s%> <S%H1346>proudly<s%>.
Be <S%H553>strong<s%>, and let your <S%H3824>heart<s%> take <S%H2388>courage<s%>, All ye that <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
